widget.title: Widget Configuration
widget.subtitle: Customize the virtual try-on widget for your store
widget.linkTextHelp: Text shown on the link below the add to cart button
widget.storeLogoHelp: Upload your store logo to appear in the widget. Accepted formats: JPG, PNG, GIF. Max size: 2MB.
widget.primaryColorHelp: Color used for the link and widget highlights
widget.fontHint: The widget automatically uses your store font for visual consistency.
widget.installationHelp: The widget is installed automatically. The "Try virtual fit" link will appear below the add to cart button on all product pages.
widget.installationHelp2: Make sure the app is enabled in your theme settings.
widget.importantBullet1: The "Try virtual fit" link always appears below the add to cart button
widget.importantBullet2: The widget font is inherited from your store
widget.importantBullet3: Customizations are applied automatically on all product pages
widget.importantBullet4: Changes may take a few minutes to appear in the store
widget.errorSupabase: Supabase not configured. Check VITE_SUPABASE_URL and VITE_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY in your environment.
widget.errorUploadLogo: Error uploading logo. Please try again.
widget.errorSaveConfig: Error saving configuration. Please try again.

dashboard.title: Omafit Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Welcome to Omafit virtual try-on
dashboard.extraImagesBanner: You are using {count} image(s) above your included limit. Additional cost: {currency} {price} per image.
dashboard.noPlanMessage: You don't have an active plan yet. Choose a plan to start using Omafit.
dashboard.aboutDescription: Omafit is an AI-powered virtual try-on that lets your customers try your clothes virtually, increasing purchase confidence and reducing returns.

sizeChart.title: Size charts
sizeChart.subtitle: Configure charts by collection and gender (male, female, unisex). The widget uses collection and gender to pick the table.
sizeChart.configureHelp: Each collection can have 3 tables (male, female, unisex). The widget receives the collection handle and gender and fetches the matching table. Use the default collection for products outside a specific collection.
sizeChart.noSizes: No sizes. Add the first one.
sizeChart.tableDisabledHint: This table is disabled. Enable it to configure.
sizeChart.howBullet1: Configure one or more collections (handle must match Shopify). Use the default collection for the entire store.
sizeChart.howBullet2: Per collection you have 3 tables: male, female, and unisex.
sizeChart.howBullet3: In each table choose exactly 3 measurement references (chest, waist, hip, length, or ankle).
sizeChart.howBullet4: The widget receives collection and gender and uses the matching table to suggest size.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.subtitle: Processed images and statistics by gender
analytics.errorShopDomain: Shop domain not found. Make sure you are accessing from Shopify Admin.
analytics.ordersError: Could not load orders and returns. Confirm the app has "Read orders" (read_orders) permission and the store has accepted permissions.
analytics.returnsHelp: Number of orders with returns in the selected period. "Before" = same number of days before app install; "After" = recent days (after Omafit).
analytics.conversionHelp: Percentage of orders that were not returned in the period. Higher is better.
analytics.byCollectionHelp: Most suggested size, preferred fit, and most chosen body type per collection.
analytics.noDataByCollection: No data by collection/gender in this period. Sessions are grouped by collection when the widget sends collection_handle when saving the session.

billing.title: Billing
billing.plansSubtitle: Choose the right plan for your store. Billing is through Shopify.
billing.planBasicDesc: Ideal for stores getting started with virtual try-on.
billing.planProDesc: For stores with higher volume of generated images.
billing.usageOverLimit: You have exceeded the included limit
billing.usageOverLimitNote: Extra images will be charged automatically according to your plan.
billing.usageNearLimit: You are close to the limit
billing.usageNearLimitNote: Consider upgrading your plan if you need more images.
billing.extraImagesDescription: {count} extra image{plural} generated this month. Estimated cost: ${price}
billing.wantToChangePlan: I want to change my plan
